sentence: Lowe's Companies, Inc. ( LOW ) will begin trading ex-dividend on July 24, 2018.
A cash dividend payment of $0.48 per share is scheduled to be paid on August 08, 2018.
Shareholders who purchased LOW prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This represents an 17.07% increase over prior dividend payment.
At the current stock price of $100.66, the dividend yield is 1.91%.
The previous trading day's last sale of LOW was $100.66, representing a -7.63% decrease from the 52 week high of $108.98 and a 42.26% increase over the 52 week low of $70.76.
LOW is a part of the Consumer Services sector, which includes companies such as Home Depot, Inc. ( HD ) and Sherwin-Williams Company ( SHW ).
LOW's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is $4.59.
Zacks Investment Research reports LOW's forecasted earnings growth in 2019 as 24.13%, compared to an industry average of 28.7%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the LOW Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
